p: Face masks, even the self-produced ones, are an indispensable safeguard in community activities’ resumption, protecting bi-directionally from droplets [ 68– 70]. The filterless FFP2 / 3 respirators represent an optimal primary and bi-directional defense even against pollen, mites, and viruses. It is essential to avoid that the rhinitis symptoms related to pollinosis can be confused with the COVID-19 infection, generating situations of concern. The correct size of the mask is fundamental because it affects the fit on the face and its effectiveness.
